data.text: @sammaciag But the accident wasn't your fault? I wouldn't back down....they are doing this so you get tired and give up. You're no quitter!! 😊
@sammaciag So ur not at fault in the accident but still pay for half the deductible? #bs
@RiderFanClaire ... They were going to make me pay the full thing but then agreed that they'd honour the half of it. Frankly at this point, I am just throwing my hands in the air.
@RiderFanClaire @sammaciag yeah... if the other person is at fault then they should pay not both
@sammaciag Wait...what? The deductible should be fully paid by the person at fault. Why are you paying half?
